item.title: US Lawmakers Introduce Congressional Resolution to Terminate Trump-Era Tariffs on India
item.description: Top News US Lawmakers Introduce Congressional Resolution to Terminate Trump-Era Tariffs on India 38 minutes ago A resolution has been introduced in the US Congress to terminate tariffs imposed on India during Donald Trump's presidency. This legislative effort aims to reshape trade relations between the United States and India by addressing existing trade barriers. The resolution's introduction marks a significant step towards potentially modifying the current tariff structure affecting bilateral trade between the two nations.

item.title: Orchasp Limited Receives In-Principle Approval for ₹8.60 Crore Preferential Allotment
item.description: Orchasp Limited Receives In-Principle Approval for ₹8.60 Crore Preferential Allotment 10 hours ago Orchasp Limited has received in-principle approval from BSE and NSE for allotment of 2,68,75,000 equity shares worth ₹8,60,00,000 through preferential allotment to promoters for loan conversion. The approvals come with strict compliance requirements including internal control strengthening and specific trading restrictions for allottees. The company must complete listing formalities within twenty days of allotment to avoid penalties.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 17 hours ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: Jash Engineering To Buy 90% Stake In WesTech Process Equipment For ₹31.37 Crores
item.description: Jash Engineering To Buy 90% Stake In WesTech Process Equipment For ₹31.37 Crores 11 hours ago Jash Engineering Limited has announced a strategic acquisition of 90% stake in WesTech Process Equipment India Private Limited for ₹31.37 crores. The cash transaction involves purchasing 53,99,849 equity shares and is expected to complete by January 15, 2026. WesTech operates in industrial process equipment with consistent revenue growth from ₹31.28 crores in 2021-22 to ₹56.01 crores in 2024-25.
